changeSet.author: herbert

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM clinlims.observation_history_type WHERE type_name = 'provisionalClinicalDiagnosis'

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO clinlims.observation_history_type(id, type_name, description,lastupdated) VALUES (nextval('observation_history_type_seq'),'provisionalClinicalDiagnosis','Tentative diagnosis made by a clinician',now());
